merquaco.pixel_classification.calculate_class_areas

merquaco.pixel_classification.calculate_class_areas(pixel_classification: ndarray)

Calculates class areas in microns

Parameters:

pixel_classification (np.ndarray) – Image array with each pixel classified with a value in [0, 1, 2, 3, 4]

Returns:

tuple of micron values for each pixel: [damage, tissue, gel detachment, ventricles]

Return type:

tuple
